channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0180; 04:06AM; 905 S Ardmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rF0XEY; #Koreatown; It took 45 firefighters 17 minutes to extinguish the flames inside the boarded-up two-story home, however two patients resulted from the fire. One approximately 21-year-old male had minor injuries from jumping out of the house from the second floor (fair condition), and an approximately 50-year-old female sustained burns and smoke inhalation (critical condition). Both patients were transported. The cause of the fire remains under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E211 E226 E229 E26 E29 EM1 EM11 RA11 RA29 RA52 RA813 SQ21 T11 T26 T29; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0167; 03:54AM; 6739 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZI1uT5; #ValleyGlen; Forty firefighters responded to the two-story apartment building, engaging in an offensive operation, coordinating fire attack and vertical ventilation, to extinguish the flames in 21 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E39 E60 EM14 RA102 RA39 RA889 SO1 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0180; 03:49AM; 3254 James M Wood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/46iZJhM; #Koreatown; Two-story single-family home with fire showing from the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E11 E211 E229 E26 E29 RA29 RA813 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0167; 03:33AM; 6739 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZI1uT5; #ValleyGlen; Two-story apartment building with fire in one unit. Offensive mode. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E39 E60 EM14 RA102 RA39 RA889 SO1 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0914; 01:47PM; 1503 W 47th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LMOyp0; Vermont#Square; It took 30 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in the rear of the home and the attic. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. LAPD Inc #2555.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E34 E66 RA266 RA815 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0914; 01:30PM; 1503 W 47th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LMOyp0; #VermontSquare; Fire showing from the rear of a one-story single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E34 E66 RA266 RA815 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Fatality Vehicle Fire; INC#1656; 09:05PM; 11800 W Strathern St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ROkm0V; #SunValley; Firefighters arrived quickly to the scene to discover an RV with heavy fire showing. During fire extinguishment, a lifeless body was discovered in the vehicle. Beyond medical help, the victim was determined deceased and remains at the scene. One adult female fled the burning RV and is in the care of Firefighter/Paramedics being treated for burns and smoke inhalation. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD Inc #4068 and Medical Examiner.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E289 E89 RA102 RA89 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1591; 08:34PM; 5025 S 7th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LJq14m; #HydePark; Firefighters arrived to find a single-story home with a roof fire that appeared to be electrical in nature and extinguished the flames in 16 minutes. No reported injuries.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E294 E46 E66 E94 RA66 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1591; 08:18PM; 5025 S 7th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LJq14m; #HydePark; One-story home with fire in the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E294 E46 E66 E94 RA66 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0862; 02:41PM; 1448 W Academy Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PChDot; #EchoPark; It took 34 firefighters 73 minutes to surround the approximately quarter-acre of burned brush and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries, and no structures threatened. Crews will remain on scene to improve perimeter containment lines and extinguish hot spots within the burn footprint. Cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BC5 E1 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E3 E35 E4 E56 E6 E90 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA3 T11 T20 T3; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
